text:
Front End JavaScript Developer | http://www.thinkbrownstone.com/ | Philadelphia, PA | Contract (9 months) | Full-time ONSITE

Willing to relocate the right candidates. Looking for someone with experience developing client-side apps with frameworks like Angular or React, able to rapidly pick up Polymer.js for this 9-month contract.

Author dynamic front-end widgets that will appear in web applications, native mobile and TV interfaces. Integrate with our client's Ruby on Rails team to build an app framework that will be used by the rest of this large multimedia/telecommunications company. Advise and mentor clients and teammates on best TDD / Node.js practices.

Apply here: http://tbi.applytojob.com/apply/ezEwut/Web-Developer-Contrac...

OR

Send us a pull request to say hi: https://github.com/thinkbrownstone/code-challenges/tree/mast...

Email me (tj.nicolaides@thinkbrownstone.com) with any questions.
